description: This file defines the 'iron-meta' web component used for sharing metadata across DOM trees in Polymer projects. It includes JavaScript code for the component's class, properties, and methods, as well as documentation comments.

classes.name: Polymer.IronMeta
classes.description: A Polymer element for sharing metadata across DOM trees using a monostate pattern.

classes.name: Polymer.IronMetaQuery
classes.description: A Polymer element for querying metadata stored in iron-meta instances.

methods.name: byKey
methods.description: Retrieves meta data value by key.

methods.name: getIronMeta
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of IronMeta.
